title: sampled_softmax_cross_entropy broken for machine translation example
body:
Config:

```
input_features:
    -
        name: english
        type: text
        level: word
        encoder: rnn
        cell_type: lstm
        reduce_output: null
        preprocessing:
          word_tokenizer: english_tokenize

output_features:
    -
        name: italian
        type: text
        level: word
        decoder: generator
        cell_type: gru
        attention: bahdanau
        reduce_input: null
        loss:
            type: sampled_softmax_cross_entropy
        preprocessing:
          word_tokenizer: italian_tokenize

training:
    batch_size: 96
```

Error (eager execution enabled):

